sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1896436_bot_ap_0.RequestDocUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>RequestDocUtils</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// 1. สร้าง Record ใหม่ในตาราง u_request_document
	var grDoc = new GlideRecord('x_1896436_bot_ap_0_request_document');
	grDoc.initialize();
	console.log('RequestDocUtils',grDoc);

	grDoc.doc_file = current.file_name; 
	grDoc.comment = "สร้างอัตโนมัติจากการอัปโหลดไฟล์: " + current.file_name;
	// grDoc.u_attachment_id = current.sys_id;
	

	grDoc.insert();
	


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-28 04:18:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>f15c37c03bf27610bc1ccdd643e45a42</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RequestDocUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f15c37c03bf27610bc1ccdd643e45a42</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-28 04:30:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
